item.title: Hollywood's franchise frenzy: More than half of top studios' 2025 movies are existing IP
item.description: The 2024 box office has been inundated with sequels, prequels and remakes. That trend will continue, and expand, in 2025.

item.title: ‚ÄòThis money is not bringing me a lot of happiness‚Äô: My husband and I have $7 million, but our kids are trouble. Should we cut them off?
